issues.description: The problem statement text refers to the attribute as 'inscribedStudents', while the UML diagram within the same problem statement and the solution repository use 'numberOfInscribedStudents' for the same conceptual entity (the attribute representing the number of inscribed students). This discrepancy could confuse students by creating a mismatch between the task description and the expected implementation, leading to difficulties in mapping requirements to code.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement text on line 17 to use 'numberOfInscribedStudents' instead of 'inscribedStudents' to align with the UML diagram and solution repository, ensuring consistent naming across all artifacts and reducing cognitive confusion for students.
